cc

Class World

  • java.lang.Object
    • cc.World

  • public class World
extends java.lang.Object
    The world class represents a plane of existence for sprites.
    Version:
    0.1
    Author:
    Josh, Matt, Jack, Abe, Robert
    See Also:
    Sprite
